shortcv.p: Dr. Dionysios N. Sotiropoulos received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from the Department of Informatics at the University of Piraeus, Greece in 2011. He holds a B.Sc. degree in Computer Science since 2003. He is currently working a post-doctoral researcher at Athens University of Economics and Business in the Department of Management Science and Technology as a member of SocioMine. He is also a visiting researcher at Norwich Business School, University of East Anglia. His primary research interests are in the areas of machine learning, data mining, evolutionary computing and signal processing, and applications in user modeling, information retrieval and intelligent software systems. His interest in Digital Social Media lies in the development of machine learning and pattern recognition algorithms for data mining purposes within the context of online social networks.
